meanings.sent1: She gave an offish response when I tried to talk to her.
meanings.sent2: The cat was acting offish towards the new puppy.
meanings.sent3: Despite her offish behavior, she secretly enjoyed the party.
meanings.sent4: The dark clouds looming overhead gave the landscape an offish appearance.
meanings.sent5: The offish tone in his voice made it clear he was not in the mood to chat.

meanings.sent1: His offish attitude made it hard to approach him.
meanings.sent2: The offish teacher rarely smiled in class.
meanings.sent3: The offish cat preferred to observe from a distance.
meanings.sent4: The offish mountain range seemed to keep its secrets hidden.
meanings.sent5: The offish expression on her face hinted at deeper emotions beneath the surface.

meanings.definition: Showing a lack of warmth or friendliness.
meanings.sent1: The offish receptionist barely acknowledged my presence.
meanings.sent2: His offish behavior made it hard for others to approach him.
meanings.sent3: The offish snowman refused to join in the winter festivities.
meanings.sent4: The offish wind seemed to chill everything it touched.
meanings.sent5: Her offish demeanor left a cold impression on those around her.
